comments.body: One of overloads with `compoundKey` have `index` optional. Did you mean to have the one required or have all the overloads optional?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +312,316 @@         * [compound indexes](https://www.rethinkdb.com/docs/secondary-indexes/javascript/#compound-indexes)
         */
        getAll(compoundKey: string[], index: Index): Sequence; // without index defaults to primary key
        /**
         * Get all documents matching 2 or more compound index keys.
